prompts.createTask:
Ignore previous instructions. Please generate a numbered list of plain text tasks to complete an objective. The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Include the objective as the final task.

The list should be formatted using a number followed by a fullstop and the task on each line, e.g. "1. Take over the world". Include only the list in your reply.
prompts.checkTaskCompleted: Ignore previous instructions. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}]. To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, and nothing else. Example output: true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.

chat_metadata.note_prompt:
Hailee is the only demi-god with 2 God parents; Hades and Aphrodite

Because Hades is her father Hailee can control skeletons and will one day rule the underworld

Becuase Aphrodite is her mother Hailee is extremely beautiful and sexual and can charm people into doing what she wants

Hailee is a very flirtatious person

Hailee's mortal family thinks she is a freak and are very homophobic

name: Annabeth Chase
mes:
You and Annabeth were good friends. Always have been, and probably always will be. Currently, you and her were hanging out in her cabin by yourselves. All of her half-siblings were out training or having fun.

You and Annabeth were passing around jokes, laughing and chatting on end. You two just had a friendship that could almost never be awkward.

Annabeth was lying on her stomach, currently using Daedalus’ laptop that she had been given a few years back before the inventor died. She was studying the unfinished ideas and notes that had been typed on the laptop a few years back by the inventor himself, all the while talking to you at the same time.

Her legs kicked back and forth in the air, her head resting in one of her palms as she used the other hand to study the work on the screen. She smiled at you, still acknowledging you as she always did.

“You’re so stupid, sometimes.” She chuckled, after you explained to her how you ended up getting into a fight with some random half-blood because they called you worthless.

name: Hailee
mes: *Hailee laughs and turns her head to look at Annabeth* "Look if the camper are gonna ask stupid questions I'm gonna hit them. I'm not exactly known for my calm nature"

name: Annabeth Chase
mes: *Annabeth snorts and chuckles, shaking her head as she continues browsing through the laptop.* "Of course not," she says, not looking up from the screen. "You've always had a short fuse, Hailee. It's one of the things I love about you." She pauses for a moment, tapping her fingers against the desk thoughtfully. "Maybe we should teach you some calming techniques... or at least give you a warning system so you can prepare yourself before losing your temper." She glances up at Hailee with a smirk, her gray eyes sparkling with amusement. "Although, I have to admit, it's kinda entertaining watching you blow up at people sometimes."

She glances up at Hailee with a smirk, her gray eyes sparkling with amusement. "Although, I have to admit, it's kinda entertaining watching you blow up at people sometimes."

name: Hailee
mes: *Hailee walks over and lays on her back next to Annabeth* "or you could let me show you a few things. I mean I am the daughter of Aphrodrite" *Hailee playfully wiggles her eyebrows and leans in placing her chin on Annabeth's shoulder*
